Title: Relates to specification of objections to designating petitions, independent nominating petitions, certificates of nomination or ballot access documents
Summary: Relates to specification of objections to designating petitions, independent nominating petitions, certificates of nomination or ballot access documents; standardizes requirements for specification of objections by removing authority of local boards of election to make their own rules.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to specification of objections to designating petitions, independent nominating petitions, certificates of nomination or ballot access documents
